title: King Crimson: In the Court (1969) Deluxe 2-CD Set (2009)
description:
King Crimson

In the Court of the Crimson King (1969)

40th Anniversary Deluxe Edition

*2-CD Set

2009


*Disc 1 features a 2009 stereo mix by Robert Fripp and Steven Wilson, drawn from the original multitrack tapes, plus five additional tracks. 

*Disc 2 features the original album mix, 24-bit remastered by Simon Hayworth in 2004, plus five bonus tracks.



2CDs / 2009 / 320Kbps



Tracklist / CD 1: Robert FrippÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 2009 Stereo Mix  

1. 21st Century Schizoid Man

2. I Talk to the Wind

3. Epitaph

4. Moonchild

5. The Court of the Crimson King

Bonus Tracks:

6. Moonchild (Full Version)

7. I Talk to the Wind (Alternate take - Duo version)

8. I Talk to the Wind (Alternate Mix)

9. Epitaph (Backing track)

10. Wind Session (Album Session Recording)



Tracklist / CD 2: 2004 Original Album Master
  
1. 21st Century Schizoid Man

2. I Talk to the Wind

3. Epitaph

4. Moonchild

5. The Court of the Crimson King

Bonus tracks:

6. 21st Century Schizoid Man (Instrumental)
 
7. I Talk to the Wind (BBC Peel session)

8. 21st Century Schizoid Man (BBC Peel Session)

9. The Court of the Crimson King (Single A Side)

10. The Court of the Crimson King (Single B Side)



King Crimson:

Robert Fripp: guitar

Ian McDonald: reeds, woodwind, vibes, keyboards, mellotron, vocals

Greg Lake: bass guitar, lead vocals

Michael Giles: drums, percussion, vocals

Peter Sinfield: words and illumination



King Crimson / In the Court of the Crimson King / Deluxe Edition / 2009



P.S. 2nd time around :)
